title: Alternate install location option would be nice
body: Currently the only place the linux lxss folder can be located is inside the user's user profile directory. It'd be nice to be able to put this folder anywhere on any drive for those of us with small SSD c: drives.

comments.body: Will this be available with WSL2? (WSL1 should still get this feature)
This Idea, will save my life!

Windows has implemented this feature internally.
A third program can use internal API to achieve this.
https://github.com/DDoSolitary/LxRunOffline
Maybe need a official UI support
